categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A rescue was performed by a Rebel strike force to free several Rebellion members from a prison bunker on the moon of Yavin 4. They succeeded freeing the captives.

The Rescue at Yavin 4 appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. This quest was part of the Empire Day / Remembrance Day event and was added to the game with the Game Update 17, published on June 24, 2010.
